name: Devansh Chauhan
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Hotel Accommodation System
projects.description: Developed a hotel accommodation system using C++ with an emphasis on Object-Oriented Programming and robust file handling techniques. Implemented functionalities for room booking, customer check-in/check-out, and billing. Utilized file handling to manage customer data, booking records, and payment transactions. Ensured accurate tracking of room availability and pricing through dynamic data updates. Applied OOP concepts to enhance system modularity, allowing for easy future expansion and maintenance.

projects.name: Supermarket Billing System
projects.description: Developed a supermarket billing system using C++ with a focus on Object-Oriented Programming principles and efficient file handling. Implemented features such as product catalog management, customer billing, and receipt generation. Used file handling to store and retrieve product data, sales records, and customer transactions securely. Designed the system to handle inventory updates, discounts, and total price calculations, ensuring accurate billing. Applied OOP concepts like classes, inheritance, and polymorphism to structure the system for scalability and maintainability.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Developed a responsive clone of Netflixs homepage using HTML and CSS. Recreated key features including the navigation bar, hero section, and movie/show carousels. Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure compatibility across various devices and screen sizes. Focused on replicating the visual design and layout, including color schemes, fonts, and spacing.

full_output.name: Devansh Chauhan
achievements_and_awards: Secured 1st Position in Google Developer Student Club Source Contribution Event At Hackathon - 2023
